data.title: Artists Road
data.meta_description: Artists Road | 63 followers on LinkedIn. Artists Road develops, finances and produces commercial comedy films for responsible budgets. | Artists Road develops, finances and produces high-concept, commercial comedies for responsible budgets. The company is a joint venture between Spyglass Media Group, Propagate Content, Artists First, and Off-Road Productions, whose principals are Gary Barber, Ben Silverman, Peter Principato, and Todd Garner, respectively. Past projects include comedy classics like “Ace Ventura”, “The Waterboy”, “13 Going on 30”, “27 Dresses”, “Paul Blart”, “21 Jump Street”, “Central Intelligence”, “Isn’t It Romantic”, and the #1 TV comedy of all time - “The Office” - to name a few.
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.
